```{r}
#| label: lf-explainer

# Extract the fitted model and workflow
fitted_model <- last_fit |>
  extract_fit_parsnip()

workflow <- last_fit |>
  extract_workflow()

# Create an explainer

  model = workflow,
  data = dfOpleiding_inschrijvingen |> select(-Retentie),
  y = dfOpleiding_inschrijvingen$Retentie,
  colorize = TRUE,
  verbose = TRUE,
  label = sBest_model)
```
